meanings.sent1: The sugar cube was dissoluble in the hot tea.
meanings.sent2: The dissoluble tablet quickly disappeared in the glass of water.
meanings.sent3: I tried to make a dissoluble tower out of salt, but it kept falling apart.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was like a dissoluble bond, easily broken under pressure.
meanings.sent5: The dissoluble nature of cotton candy made it a favorite treat for kids.

meanings.definition: Capable of being broken up or destroyed.
meanings.sent1: The dissoluble paper crumbled easily in my hands.
meanings.sent2: The dissoluble sandcastle washed away with the incoming tide.
meanings.sent3: The dissoluble cookie was no match for my hungry brother.
meanings.sent4: Their dissoluble plans fell apart when the storm hit.
meanings.sent5: The dissoluble ice sculpture melted under the warm sun.

meanings.definition: Capable of being ended or terminated.
meanings.sent1: The dissoluble contract allowed for a quick termination of the agreement.
meanings.sent2: The dissoluble relationship came to an abrupt end.
meanings.sent3: The dissoluble party ended sooner than expected due to the noise complaint.
meanings.sent4: Their dissoluble argument concluded with a mutual apology.
meanings.sent5: The dissoluble meeting wrapped up in record time.
